title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
efling we've encountered before. He claims she is a powerful devil and a danger to the entire Sword Coast. We met a group of paladins who seek Karlach, the very same target who Wyll is hunting. They provided us with her exact whereabouts.

Continue to travel with Wyll and Karlach.

Karlach has joined the party, though Wyll hasn't confronted her as of yet. This uneasy peace can't last forever.

Talk to Wyll about Karlach.

A monster hunter named Wyll confronted Karlach in our camp, believing her
